txt.en: The Main Hall is now repaired. There is much yet to do.

'The Mead Hall is the heart of any Rohirrim town. It represents strength, hope, and tradition. Once it is rebuilt, it will signal to the people of the Eastemnet that we are serious in restoring Hytbold to its former glory.'
The Main Hall is now repaired. There is much yet to do.
'Hytbold is one step closer to being rebuilt and restored.'
There is much work to do to rebuild the town of Hytbold.
There is much work to do to rebuild the town of Hytbold.
Bring the Tokens of Hytbold to Edgal
